item.title: Swift Cheat Sheet for iPhone Location Services Access & Usage
item.description:
This is a cheat sheet of the code and workflow for iPhone location access and usage, from requesting permission to using the location of the user’s device.
Framework Import import CoreLocation
Set Location Usage Description in Info.plist This is a required first step If you don’t set this, your app simply won’t present the user with the system alert to request access to the location (and, of course, you won’t be getting any location data for your app either).
